Colophon reads: Here endeth the boke Intytuled the gouernaunce of housholde. Imprynted by me Robert wyer, dwellyng at the sygne of seynt John Euangelist in seynt Martyns parysshe in the bysshop of Norwytche rentes, besyde Charinge crosse.
